title: Checking List Containment in Python (Challenge)
description: In this challenge, you will implement a function to check if all the elements of one list are contained in another list, regardless of the order of the elements.

meta.title: Python List Containment | Coding Challenge
meta.description: Explore a Python coding challenge that teaches how to check if one list is contained in another, regardless of order. Learn efficient techniques for list manipulation.
meta.keywords: Python, List Containment, Coding Challenge, List Manipulation, Order-Independent Comparison
